description: I had to remove this because the spreadsheet is unusable. About half the view is covered by some kind of formatting toolbar that it is impossible to remove.

The idea of an office suite optimized for touch screen is a good idea and something the open source community needs to focus on. This application needs some work to make it useful, and I hope the creators of this software take the time to make it work on all screens and computers - including smartphones. That would be great, and I look forward to it.
summary: The idea is good, but it needs work to be useful

description: all I see is a white clean window
The entire window is only white.
summary: The entire window is only white

description: Mia is not writing this review. I have reloaded her machine because it was painfully slow and kept hanging after Windows 7. I seached for Only Office but was only give the option to install Gemini. I read the comments and wanted to see for myself the problem. I will agree that the default setup should not allow a tool dominate the screen. I searched the program menu to find out how to adjust it. I discovered that the program can be changed in many ways. You must navigate to the Settings menu, configure the tool bar, filter for show docker, (i placed it after save), apply then select it. I proceded to remove it after the offending dock turned off. If you need any assistance i can be reached at the following email. support@2surve.com

This is a KDE project, right? but it doesn't seem to connect to KIO for SMB shares.
Other than that, opening ODF files from other office suites produces a file completely stripped of itś formatting.

Al principio creí que Gemini era el nombre de la suite Calligra, o que el nombre completo de la suite era Calligra Gemini, sin embargo pronto comprendí que Gemini son un conjunto de apps de la suite Calligra (Words y Stage) reunidos en una sola app especializada para dispositivos táctiles, ya que encontrar información sobre la suite era un tanto escasa y la página oficial de la suite Calligra contiene algunos links caídos o desactualizados. La versión actual de este repositorio en Discover indica que es la versión 1.3. aunque el sitio web indica 2.6., por lo que no estoy seguro del porqué la instalación de Gemini instala a parte Words, Stage y Sheets individualmetne y no Kexi o Karbon (instalar Karbon dentro de Discover indica que está desmantenido lo cual aumenta la confusión), y porqué Words o Stage dentro de Gemini tiene cierres repentinos y sufre de mayor inestabilidad que las apps individualmente no poseen. Sin embargo, es emocionante seguir atento al desarrollo del proyecto y estar dispuestos a apoyar su desarrollo, increíblemente prometedor.
summary: Terminología confusa y más inestable de Calligra

description: При попытке открыть docx упало с ошибкой. Не смог открыть ни один из документов, находящихся у меня в наличии.
时常崩溃，触摸模式也好像没法编辑。不过，好歹有了个大致样子？（但看起来很丑）
summary: 看起来不像是能用的样子
